English: The team, comprising one female and three males, departed aboard an Ethiopian Airlines flight.
Yoruba: Ikọ̀ yìí tí ó ní obìnrin kan àti ọkùnrin mẹ́ta gbéra kúrò lórílẹ̀-èdè pẹ̀lú ọkọ̀ òfurufú Ethiopian

English: The lone female athlete is Faith Obazuaye, while her male counterparts are Nasiru Bello, Tajudeen Agunbiade and Olufemi Alabi.
Yoruba: Obìnrin kan ṣoṣo yìí ni Faith Obazuaye, nígbà tí àwọn ọkùnrin akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ jẹ́ Nasiru Bello, Tajudeen Agunbiade àti Olufemi Alabi.

English: The championships will serve off on Aug. 27 and end  on Sept. 3.
Yoruba: Ìdíje yìí yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ní ọjọ́ kẹtàdínlọ́gbọ̀n oṣù kẹjọ yóò sì parí ní ọjọ́ kẹta oṣù kẹsàn-án.

English: Bankole, speaking before departure, said the athletes were fully prepared for the task ahead.
Yoruba: Bankole, nígbà tí ó ń sọ̀rọ̀ kí wọ́n tó gbéra, so pé àwọn aláyò yìí ti múra gidigidi fún iṣẹ́ tí ó wà níwájú wọn.

English: “We believe in them and their abilities and I’m optimistic they will make the country proud. They should however, play all games cautiously with their eyes on the target.”
Yoruba: “A nígbàgbọ́ nínú wọn àti ohun tí wọ́n lè ṣe, mo sì ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé wọn yóò mú orílẹ̀-èdè wa yangàn. Kí àwọn pẹ̀lú fi ara balẹ̀ gbá gbogbo ayò náà pẹ̀lú àfojúsùn.

English: Bankole, who is also a Deputy Commissioner of Police, however, appealed to Nigerians resident in China to come and encourage their compatriots.
Yoruba: Bankole, tí ó jẹ́ Kọmíṣánnà Ọlọ́pàá, bákan náà pàrọwà sí àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà tí wọ́n ń gbé ní orílẹ̀-èdè China láti wá wú àwọn olùfọkànsìn wọ̀nyí lórí.

English: --- I’ll ensure I stay long at City – Kompany
Yoruba: --- Mà á ríi pé mo dúró pé nínú ikọ̀ City – Kompany

English: Manchester City captain Vincent Kompany says his natural athletic ability and desire to keep improving can help him prolong his career with the English Premier League champions.
Yoruba: Balógun ikọ̀ Manchester City Vincent Kompany sọ pé àbùdá àdámọ́ òun láti máa ṣe dáadáa le mú kí òun ó fa ọjọ́ òun gùn nínú ikọ̀ aṣaájú ìdíje Premier League ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì náà.

English: The 32-year-old Belgian international defender has been forced to overcome a number of injury issues during his 10-year stint at the club.
Yoruba: Ọmọ ọdún méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n adiẹ̀yìnmú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Belgium yìí ti gbìyànjú lọ́pọ̀ láti jàjà bọ́ lọ́wọ́ oríṣìíríṣìí ìfarapa láti nǹkan bí ọdún mẹ́wàá tí ó ti wà nínú ikọ̀ náà..

English: “I think what people have never really understood with me is that aside from having had some injuries I’m actually lucky to be a good athlete naturally.
Yoruba: “Mo wòye pé ohun tí àwọn ènìyàn ò tíì fi taratara mọ̀ nípa mi ni pé yàtọ̀ sí níní àwọn ìfarapa, mó rí oore-ọ̀fẹ́ jíjẹ́ alábùdá àdámọ́ eré sísá gbà.

English: “So, I still feel mobile,” Kompany, whose contract expires next season, told the club’s website.
Yoruba: “Nítorí náà, eré ṣì ṣì wà lẹ́sẹ̀ mi,” Kompany, tí àdéhùn rẹ̀ yóò tẹnu bẹpo ní sáà tó ń bọ̀ ló sọ fún ìkànnì àyélujára ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù náà.

English: Kompany was a substitute in Manchester City’s 2-0 win at Arsenal in their league opening fixture, but he returned to the starting side which thumped Huddersfield Town 6-1 last weekend.
Yoruba: Kompany jẹ́ gbígbé wọlé nínú ìjáwé olúborí àmì ayò méjì sí òdo pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Arsenal nínú ìdíje àkọ́kọ́ wọn, ṣùgbọ́n ó bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ tí ó fìyà jẹ ikọ̀ Huddersfield Town pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́fà sí ọ̀kan ní òpin ọ̀sẹ̀ tó kọjá.

English: --- Hockey: 2018 Super League kicks off on Saturday
Yoruba: --- Ayò Hockey: Ìdíje Líìgì ọdún 2018 yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ lọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday)

English: Fatai Atanda, Technical Committee member of the Nigeria Hockey Federation (NHF), on Thursday said the 2018 Super League would kick off on Saturday at the National Stadium, Abuja.
Yoruba: Fatai Atanda, ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ìgbìmọ̀ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ àjọ tó ń mójú tó ìdíje Hocky lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà (NHF), sọ ní ọjọ́bọ (Thursday) pé Líìgì ayò Hockey ti ọdún 2018 yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ní ọjọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday) ní pápá ìṣeré ìjọba àpapọ̀, Abuja.

English: Atanda said the tourney would be played on four quarter format, and that 16 clubs, comprising eight male and female categories, would participate in the tournament.
Yoruba: Atanda sọ pé ìpín mẹ́rin ni wọn yóò pín ìdíje náà sí, ó sì sọ pé ikọ̀ mẹ́rìndínlógún ikọ̀ ọkùnrin mẹ́jọ àti obìnrin mẹ́jọ ni yóò kópa.

English: In the previous year, Kada Queens of Kaduna lifted the trophy for the female category, while Niger Flickers won the men category.
Yoruba: Lọ́dún tó kọjá, Kada Queens ìlú Kaduna ni ó gbé ife ti àwọn obìnrin lọ ilé nígbà tí Niger Flickers gba ti àwọn ọkùnrin.

English: The league is in line with the efforts of the federation to promote hockey among Nigerians, especially the youth, to enhance professionalism.
Yoruba: Ìdíje yìí wà ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú àlàkalẹ̀ àjọ yìí láti tẹ ayò hockey síwájú lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà, pàápàá jùlọ láàrin àwọn ọ̀dọ́ láti lè ṣe àlékún iṣẹ́ ọwọ́.

English: --- Thank you – Ta Lou relishes Asaba triumph, appreciates fans
Yoruba: --- E ṣé o – Ta Lou relishes ìjáwé olúborí Asaba, ó dú pé lọ́wọ́ àwọn alátilẹyìn

English: Following her triumph in the 100 metres final of the 2018 African Senior Athletics Championship in Asaba, Ivorien sprint star Ta Lou Marie Josée‏ has expressed her appreciation for the massive support from her countrymen.
Yoruba: Látàrí ìjáwé olúborí rẹ̀ nínú ìdíje ọlọ́gọ́rùn mítà ní àṣekágbá ìdíje àwọn Àgbà Asáré orí pápá ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ọdún 2018 ní ìlú Asaba, Gbajúgbajà ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ ehoro ọmọ ilẹ̀ Ivory coast Ta Lou Marie Josée‏ ti fi ẹ̀mí ìmoore rẹ̀ hàn fún àtilẹ́yìn ńlá láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn olólùfẹ́ eré ìdárayá lórílẹ̀-èdè.

English: Marie Josee Ta Lou on Thursday won the gold medal in a time of 11.15 seconds, beating Ghana’s Janet Amponsah who clocked 11.54 seconds; and Nigeria’s young prodigy Udo Joy-Gabriel who finished with a time of 11.58 seconds.
Yoruba: Marie Josee Ta Lou lọ́jọ́bọ (Thursday) gba àmì ẹyẹ wúrà ìdíje náà pẹ̀lú eré ìṣẹ́jú àáyá mọ́kànlá-lé-ìṣẹ́jú-iná-mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dógún 11.15 tí ó fi na Janet Amponsah ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Ghana tí ó sá tirẹ̀ ní ìṣẹ́jú àáyá méjìlá-dín- ìṣẹ́jú-iná-mẹ́fa 11.54 seconds; nígbà tí ọ̀dọ́mọdebìnrin ọmọ Nàìjííríà Udo Joy-Gabriel pári tirẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ìṣẹ́jú àáyá méjìlá-dín- ìṣẹ́jú-iná-méjì

English: With the 100 metres title now in the bag, Ta Lou will try to consolidate on her global ranking by putting up stronger showings on the IAAF Diamond league circuit later in the year.
Yoruba: Pẹ̀lú bí ó se ti gba àmì ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje ọlọ́gọ́rùn mítà sápò rẹ̀, Ta Lou yóò gbìyàjú láti mú ìgbèrú bá ìkópa ipò rẹ̀ lágbàáyé nípa kíkópa dáradára nínú ìdíje IAAF tí yóò wáyé láìpẹ́ yìí.

English: --- A disabled dancer encourage the Kenya Citizen.
Yoruba: --- Àkàndá ẹ̀dá oníjó gba àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Kenya níyànjú.

English: The world health organization has said over eighty (81) million Africans that are diabled, and many of them face discouragement and hatred, which can kill their opportunity to take part in the in education, works and their well being.
Yoruba: Àjọ Elétò Ilera Àgbááyé ti sọ pé ó lé ní ọ̀kànlélọ́gọ́rin mílíọ̀nù àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ tí ó jẹ́ Àkàndá, bẹ́ẹ̀ni ọ̀pọ̀ nínú wọn sì ń fojú winá ìrẹ̀wẹ̀sì ọkàn àti ìkórìíra, léyìí tí ó ń ṣe àkóbá fún àǹfààní wọn láti kópa nínú ètò ẹ̀kọ́, iṣẹ́ àti ìgbáyégbádùn.

English: For someone to dande in air is one of the common dance among the disabled in Kenya.
Yoruba: Fún ènìyàn láti jó lójú ofurufú jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwọn ijó tí ó wọ́pọ̀ láàárín àwọn àkàndá lórílẹ̀-ède Kenya.

English: Nicholas Ouma Odhiambo said that the team gave him the opportunity to showcase in the dance competition.
Yoruba: Nicholas Ouma Odhiambo sọ pé ikọ̀ yìí fún òhun ní oore-ọ̀fẹ́ láti lè kópa nínú ìdíje ijó jíjó náà

English: --- Why i accepted the Juventus challenge – Ronaldo
Yoruba: --- Ìdí tí mo fi gba iṣẹ́ ikọ̀ Juventus – Ronaldo

English: Portuguese striker Cristiano Ronaldo says he joined Italian giants Juventus because he wants to help the ‘Old Lady’ win more trophies – particularly the UEFA champions league.
Yoruba: Atamátàsé ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Portugal Christiano Ronaldo sọ pé òun dara pọ̀ mọ́ ògbóhùntarìgì ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Italy torí pé òun fẹ́ ràn ikọ̀ 'old lady' ọ̀hún lọ́wọ́ láti túbọ̀ máa gba ife ẹ̀yẹ sí i pàápàá jùlọ ìfẹ́ ẹ̀yẹ UEFA Champions League.

English: Speaking to the media shortly after his unveiling, Ronaldo said he wanted to leave a mark on the Serie A.
Yoruba: Nígbà tí ó ń bá àwọn oníròyìn sọ̀rọ̀ lẹ́yìn ìgbà tí a ṣí aṣọ lójú rẹ̀, Ronaldo sọ pé òun fẹ́ ní ipa nínú ìdíje Serie A.

English: “I like challenges and I know that this will be a difficult one.
Yoruba: "Mo fẹ́ràn ìfigagbága, mo sì mọ̀ pé èyí yóò le.

English: “The standing ovation I received here at the Allianz was a spectacular moment for me.
Yoruba: "Ìdúrókíni tí mo gbà ní Allianz níbi jọ mí lójú.

English: Ronaldo promised to end Juventus’s European barren run.
Yoruba: Ronaldo ṣèlérí láti fi òpin sí ọ̀dá ife European tí ó bá ikọ̀ Juventus.

English: Ronaldo joined Juventus from Real Madrid in a deal worth over 100 million pounds.
Yoruba: Ronaldo dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ Juventus láti ikọ̀ Real Madrid pẹ̀lú àdéhùn owó tí ó lé ọgọ́rùn-ún owó pounds.

English: Within nine years, Ronaldo won four UEFA champions league titles, and two La Liga championships.
Yoruba: Láàárín ọdún mẹ́sàn-án Ronaldo gba ife ẹ̀yẹ UEFA Champions league mẹ́rin àti ife La Liga méjì.

English: --- VON wins NUJ Women’s Table Tennis Tournament
Yoruba: --- VON gba àmì ẹyẹ ìdíje Teníìsì orí tábìlì Obìnrin tí NUJ gbé kalẹ̀.

English: Voice of Nigeria’s Kissit Golit has emerged winner of the Women’s 2nd NUJ Chapel Table Tennis tournament.
Yoruba: Kissit Golit ti Voice of Nigeria tí gbé igbá orókè nínú ìdíje Teníìsì orí tábìlì Obìnrin tí NUJ gbé kalẹ̀ ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kkejì irú rẹ.

English: The annual tournament which enters its 2nd edition was played on Saturday, 14th July 2018 at the Chinese cultural central, Abuja.
Yoruba: Ìdíje ọlọ́dọọdún yìí tí ó tí wọ ẹ̀ẹ̀kejì irú rẹ̀ jẹ́ gbígbá ní ọjọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday), Ọjọ́ kẹrìnlá, Oṣù keje ọdún 2018 ní gbongan ilé àṣà ilẹ̀ China ní ìlú Abuja.

English: The Chinese cultural centre is collaborating with the Nigerian Union of Journalist (NUJ), FCT chapel.
Yoruba: Ilé àṣà ilẹ̀ China ń ṣe àṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú Ẹgbẹ́ àwọn Òníròyin Nàìjíríà (NUJ) ẹ̀ka ti olú ìlú ilẹ̀ Nàìjíríà.

English: Tukumbo Adesonya emerged winner of the men’s 2nd NUJ inter chapel Table Tennis Tournament, he represented News Agency of Nigeria beating defending champion from the ministry of information, Henry Onosanya, Sangotola Tobi was one of the three people that represented Voice of Nigeria but was unlucky as he was eliminated in the quarter final.
Yoruba: Tokumbo Adesanya ni ó gbaàmì ẹyẹ ìdíje Teníìsì orí tábìlì Ọkùnrin tí NUJ gbé kalẹ̀, ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì ti ẹ̀ka sí ẹ̀ka. Òun ló ṣojú àjọ oníròyìn ilẹ̀ Nàìjíríà láti na aṣojú ilé-iṣẹ́ ọ̀rọ̀ ìròyìn tí àmì ẹyẹ yìí wà lọ́wọ́ rẹ̀, Onosanya, Sangotola Tobi yìí wà lára àwọn mẹ́ta tí wọ́n ṣojú Voice of Nigeria ṣùgbọ́n kò bóde pàdé pẹ̀lú bí wọ́n ṣe yọwọ́ kílàńkó rẹ̀ ní ìpele kejì sí àsekágbá.

English: Also representing Voices of Nigeria was Comfort Babatunde who was eliminated in the first round.
Yoruba: Lára àwọn tí ó tún ṣojú Voices of Nigeria ni Comfort Babatunde tí wọ́n já kúrò ní ìpele àkọ́kọ́.

English: --- Official: Ronaldo joins Juventus in 105mn pounds deal
Yoruba: --- Ìròhìn gbangba: Ronaldo dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ Juventus pẹ̀lú àdéhùn àrùnlélọ́gọ́rùn-ún mílíọ́nu owó pounds.

English: Portuguese striker Cristiano Ronaldo has officially left Real Madrid for Italian giants Juventus of Turin for 105 million pounds.
Yoruba: Atamátàsé ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè portugal Cristiano Ronaldo ti kúrò ní inú ikọ̀ Real Madrid bọ́ sí inú akínkanjú ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Italy Juventus ti ìlú Turin pẹ̀lú  àrùnlélọ́gọ́rùn-ún mílíọ́nu owó pounds.

English: In a statement released on Tuesday, Real Madrid said it sold Ronaldo to Juventus in-line with the wishes of the 33 year old.
Yoruba: Ní nínú ọ̀rọ̀ kan tí a fi léde lọ́jọ́ ìṣẹ́gun (Tuesday), Real Madrid sọ pé àwọn ta Ronaldo sí inú ikọ̀ Juventus ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú ìfẹ́ ọmọ ẹ̀tàlélọ́gbọ̀n ọdún ọ̀hún.

English: “Real Madrid wants to express its gratitude to a player who has proved to be the best in the world and who has marked one of the brightest times in the history of our club and world football.
Yoruba: “Real Madrid fẹ́ fi ẹ̀mí ìmoore wọn hàn sí agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó ti fi ara rẹ̀ hàn gẹ́gẹ́ bí agbábọ́òlù tí ó dára jùlọ lágbàáyé tí ó sì ti nípa lórí àwọn àsìkò tí ó dára fún wa jùlọ nínú ìtàn bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lágbàáyé.

English: “Beyond the conquered titles, the trophies achieved and the triumphs achieved in the playing fields during these 9 years, Cristiano Ronaldo has been an example of dedication, work, responsibility, talent and improvement,” the statement said.
Yoruba: “Yàtọ̀ sí àwọn àmì ẹyẹ yìí, àwọn ife ẹ̀yẹ tí ó gbà àti àwọn ìjáwé olúborí rẹ̀ lórí pápá láàrin ọdún mẹ́sàn-án yìí, Cristiano Ronaldo ti jẹ́ àpẹẹrẹ ìfarajìn, ìṣojúṣe, ẹ̀bùn àti ìlọsíwájú.” nínú ọ̀rọ̀ náà.

English: Ronaldo leaves the Spanish capital having become the top scorer in the history of Real Madrid with 451 goals in 438 games.
Yoruba: Ronaldo kúro ní olú ìlú orílẹ̀-èdè Spaini yìí lẹ́yìn tí ó ti di ẹni tí ó rí àwọn he jùlọ nínú ìtàn ikọ̀ Real Madrid pẹ̀lù àmì ayò ọ̀tàlénírinwódínmẹ́sàn-án nínú ifẹ̀sẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ òjìlénírinwódín-méjì.

English: In total he won 16 titles, including 4 European Cups, 3 of them consecutive and 4 in the last 5 seasons.
Yoruba: Ní àpapọ̀ ó gba ife ẹ̀yẹ mẹ́rìndínlógún nínú wọn ni ife European mẹ́rin, méta jẹ́ léra wọn nígbà tí ìkẹrin jẹ́ sáà márùn-ún sẹ́yìn.

English: --- Mahrez signs five-year deal with Man City
Yoruba: --- Mahrez tọwọ́ bọ ìwé àdéhùn ọdún márùn-ún pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Man City

English: Algerian international Riyad Mahrez secured his move to Premier League champions Manchester City on Tuesday, seven months after his hopes were dashed when City refused to pay Leicester’s asking price.
Yoruba: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Algeria Riyad Mahrez parí ìtọkọ́sọ́ rẹ̀ lọsí ikọ̀ aṣáájú ìdíje Premier League, Manchester City lọ́jọ́ ìṣẹ́gun (Tuesday), lẹ́yìn oṣù méje tí ó ti sọ̀rètí nù làtàrí pé ikọ̀ City kọ̀ láti san owó tí ikọ̀ Leicester ń bèèrè fún.

English: This time though Leicester said they had sold him for what is a club-record fee, with some reports suggesting the champions paid £60 million ($79.6million), which would make it their record buy.
Yoruba: Ní àsìkò yìí, ikọ̀ Leicester so pẹ́ àwọn tà á ní iye owó tí ó wọn inú ìwé ìtàn ikọ̀ náà, tí àwọn ìròyìn kan sì ń ní I lérò pé ikọ̀ aṣáájú yìí san ọgọ́ta mílíọ́nù owó pounds (Ọgọ́rin mílíọ́nù dín díẹ̀ Owó dọ́là) léyìí tí yóò sọ ọ́ di èyí tí ó ń wọ inú ìwé ìtàn.

English: The 27-year-old a pivotal figure when Leicester stormed to a shock Premier League title in 2016 signed a five-year contract.
Yoruba: Ọmọ ọdún mẹ́tàdínlọ́gbọ̀n yìí tí ó jẹ́ èèkàn nígbà tí ikọ̀ Leicester gba ife Premier League lọ́nà ìyanu lọ́dún 2016 tọwọ́ bọ adéhùn ọdún márùn-ún.

English: “I am so pleased to have joined City, a side playing great football under Pep Guardiola,.
Yoruba: “Inú mi dùn láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ City, ikọ̀ tí ó ń gbá bọ́ọ̀lù tó ta sánsán lábẹ́ Pep Guardiola.

English: Watching them from afar has been a pleasure.
Yoruba: Wíwò wọ́n lókèèrè jẹ́ oun tí ó máa ń wù mí..

English: Pep is committed to playing attacking football, which is a perfect for me, and City’s performances last season were outstanding.” Mahrez said.
Yoruba: Pep jẹ́ ẹni tí ó fi ara sí títi bọ́ọ̀lù síwájú, léyìí tí ó ṣe régí pẹ̀lú mi, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ìṣọwọ́ṣiṣẹ́ Cítì ní sáà tó lọ kò lẹ́gbẹ́” èyí ni Mahrez wí.

English: ---Spain appoints Luis Enrique as new coach
Yoruba: ---Spain yan Luis Enrique gẹ́gẹ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tuntun.

English: Spain’s football federation says former Barcelona coach Luis Enrique has been appointed to take charge of the national team.
Yoruba: Àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Spain ti sọ pé akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Barcelona tẹ̀lẹ̀rí Luis Enrique ti di yíyàn gẹ́gẹ́ láti gba àkóso ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè náà.

English: He replaces Julen Lopetegui, who was sacked on the eve of the World Cup after accepting the job at Real Madrid, with Fernando Hierro taking temporary charge for the finals in Russia.
Yoruba: Ó rọ́pọ̀ Julen Lopetegui, tí wọ́n yọ níṣẹ́ ní ife ẹyẹ àgbááyé ku ọ̀la lẹ́yìn tí ó gba iṣẹ́ nínú ikọ̀ Real Madrid, nígbà tí Fernando Hierro ti ń tukọ̀ àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ní Russia fún igbà díẹ̀.

English: Luis Enrique has signed a two-year contract.
Yoruba: Luis Enrique tọwọ́ bọ àdéhùn ọdún méjì.

English: --- World Cup trophy on display in Moscow
Yoruba: --- Ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé di ṣíṣàfihàn ní Moscow

English: The FIFA World Football Museum exhibition will present the 2018 FIFA World Cup winners’ trophy for the entire day of Sunday in Moscow.
Yoruba: Àjọ tó ń ṣàfihan nǹkan ìṣèmbayé eré ìdárayá FIFA yóò pàtẹ ìfe ẹ̀yẹ olùjáwé olúborí ọdún 2018 fún odidi ọjọ́ àìkú (Sunday) ní ìlú Moscow.

English: It will be displayed alongside the replica of the Jules Rimet Cup, the trophy that was first presented to winners in 1930 when the competition started.
Yoruba: Yóò jẹ́ ṣíṣàfihàn pẹ̀lú ife ẹ̀yẹ irú rẹ̀, ife Jules Rimet, tí wọ́n kọ́kọ́ fún ẹni tí ó gba ìdìje náà lọ́dún 1930 nígbà tí ìdíje náà bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀.

English: The exhibition, known as “The History Makers’’, will hold at the Hyundai Motorstudio on New Arbat Avenue in Moscow.
Yoruba: Ìṣàfihàn yìí tí a mọ̀ sí, “Àwọn Akọ̀tàn”, yóò wáyé ní yàrá àwòrán ilé-iṣẹ́ Hyundai Motorstudio ní agbègbè New ní ìlú Moscow.

English: The exhibition will end five days after the final match of the 2018 FIFA World Cup in Russia on July 15.
Yoruba: Ìṣàfihàn yóò parí lẹ́yìn ọjọ́ karùn-ún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àsekágbá ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé ọdún 2018 lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia lọ́jọ́ kẹẹ̀ẹ́dógún oṣù keje.

English: World football body, FIFA, said in a statement on Saturday that admission to the exhibition was free, adding that media representatives were allowed to visit the exhibition, take photos or film inside.
Yoruba: Àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lágbàáyé, FIFA, sọ nínú ọ̀rọ̀ kan lọ́jọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday) pé ọ̀fẹ́ ni ìwọlé sí ibi Ìṣàfihàn yìí, ó fi kún un pé wọ́n gba àwọn oníróyìn láàyè láti wọlé, láti ya àwòrán àti láti ká àwòrán sílẹ̀ níbẹ̀.

English: “The exhibition ground floor is a tribute to the passion and devotion of fans from all over the world and their role in making the FIFA World Cup a compelling spectacle.
Yoruba: “Ibi ìṣàfihàn yìí jẹ́ ìmọrírì ìfẹ́ àti ìkọbiarasí àwọn alátìlẹyìn káàkiri àgbááyé àti ipa wọn lórí ríra iyì fún ife ẹ̀yẹ FIFA àgbááyé.

English: “There, visitors can see messages from fans of all 32 competing nations and a special display for the adidas Telstar Official Match Balls of the 2018 FIFA World Cup used for the kick-off of the 64 games played in Russia.
Yoruba: “Níbẹ̀, àwọn olùbẹ̀wò le rí àtẹ̀jíṣẹ́ láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn alátìlẹyìn àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n tí wọn ń figa gbága àti àfihàn àwọn bọ́ọ̀lù tí wọn lò fún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ mẹ́rìnlélọ́gọ́ta ife ẹ̀yẹ FIFA àgbááyé ọdùn 2018 lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia tí ilé iṣẹ́ adidas pèsè.

English: “After each match, the ball which started the game is added to the growing collection at the exhibition,’’ a statement by Moritz Ansorge, the FIFA World Football Museum collections manager, indicated.
Yoruba: “Lẹ́yìn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ kọ̀ọ̀kan, bọ́ọ̀lù tí ó bá bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà yóò di fífikún ara àwọn àfihàn yìí”,’’ ní ọ̀rọ̀ tí Moritz Ansorge alákòóso Àjọ tó ń ṣàfihan nǹkan ìṣèmbayé eré ìdárayá FIFA ṣe lálàyé.

English: --- Tite gets new 4 year contract
Yoruba: --- Tite gba àdéhùn ọdún mẹ́rin mìíràn.

English: Brazil’s Football Federation (CBF) is offering head coach Tite a new four-year deal, despite the five-time World Champion’s elimination in the quarter-finals.
Yoruba: Àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Brazil (CBF) ń fi àdéhùn ọdún mẹ́rin mìíràn lọ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ náà Tite tòhun tẹnu ìjakúrò nínú ife ẹ̀yẹ agbááyé lẹ́ẹ̀marùn-ún ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ láti ìpele kejì sí àṣekágbá.

English: According to the Brazilian website Globo, CBF is satisfied with the head coach’s work and is offering him a new contract.
Yoruba: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Globo ìtàkùn ilẹ̀ Brazil ṣe sọ, Ìṣọwọ́ṣiṣẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà yìí tẹ́ Àjọ CBF lọ́rùn, wọ́n sì ń fi àdéhùn mìíràn lọ̀ ọ́.

English: The 57-year-old took charge of Brazil in June 2016 helping the team qualify for the 2018 FIFA World Cup from the first place among the South American teams.
Yoruba: Ẹni ọdún mẹ́tàdínlọ́gọ́ta gba àkóso ikọ̀ Brazil ní inú oṣù kẹfà ọdún 2016, ó si ran ikọ̀ náà lọ́wọ́ láti pegedé sí inú ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé FIFA ọdún 2018 pẹ̀lú ipò kíní láti inú àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè ilẹ̀ Guusu America.

English: Under Tite’s management, Brazil have secured 20 victories and four draws losing only two games so far, including Friday’s defeat to Belgium.
Yoruba: Lábẹ́ àkóso Tite, ikọ̀ Brazil ti jáwé olúborí ní ìgbà ogún, wọ́n ta ọ̀mì mẹ́rin wọ́n sì pàdánù lẹ́ẹ̀mejì péré, nínú rẹ̀ ni ìpàdánù ọjọ́ ẹtì (Friday) pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Belgium.
